DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacodynamics ocular blood flow measurement multiple drop unoprostone isopropyl administration versus placebo subject dry age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Ocular Blood Flow Effects Unoprostone Isopropyl Adults With Dry Age-related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 50 year screen Ametropy ≤ 3 diopter Clear ocular medium Visual acuity study eye > 20/40 Presence ocular condition study eye ( AMD ) may progress course study could affect central vision , ocular condition may confound factor study Blood donation previous 3 week Current smoker history smoking within 5 year enrollment Treatment protocolspecified prohibit concomitant medication Prior exposure Rescula ( unoprostone isopropyl ) know sensitivity component study medication ( e.g . benzalkonium chloride )
